ComicInfo.Summary:
What is the secret truth behind Miss Bitters? Is she a undead witch? A crone-beast as old as time itself? A dark instrument of infernal vengeance in a smelly dress? Everyone has a theory, and when Miss Bitters doesn’t show up for Skool one morning, they all come out of the woodwork.
Story TitlesTales of BittersThe Evil Ms. BittersBitters and the WitchMs. Bitters' BugsSweetheart Bitters*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------- Reg | Regular Cover | Warren Wucinich | 1 | RI | Retailer Incentive Variant Cover | Shmorky | 2 |

ComicInfo.Penciller: Fred C. Stresing, Ian McGinty, KC Green, Warren Wucinich
ComicInfo.Inker: Fred C. Stresing, Fred C. Stresing, KC Green, Meg Casey, Warren Wucinich
ComicInfo.Characters: Dib Membrane, Gaz Membrane, Gretchen, Keef, Minimoose, Ms. Bitters, Recap Kid, Zim
